Texto: 
physical exam and labs are within normal limits.
patient was not amenable to proton-pump inhibitor therapy and was scheduled for a laparoscopic nissen fundiplication.
upper gi series demonstrates the presence of a sliding hiatal hernia.
hiatal hernia
>> sliding hiatal hernia
>> paraesophageal hiatal hernia
slightly overweight male with progressively increasing cough and reflux symptoms.
